info.name: Stylish - Minimal [by daylo]
info.description:
The companion website for the Stylish extension never looked so fresh.
Please give constructive criticism and requests. :)
No futher support - released under CC0 - see profile
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.8 I've hidden the lower left advertisement. I've also adjusted the social sharing tools on the search page to make them more streamlined and prettierified. The screenshots have been updated.
